channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
hey guys i havent done this in years but her is my error
oh and btw... its a compile and run .bat here is text
@echo off MyScape color 0c
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now compiling server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now starting server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server pause
here is snapshot of error
[img]http://www.snapdrive.net/files/191062/Error.bmp[/img]

then i get…
just a sec waitin for pic to load…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 06:31:28 PM[/size][hr] [br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 06:32:13 PM[/size][hr]aha there ya go
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 06:33:25 PM[/size][hr]i gtg everyone with advice post please even if u see other suggjestions o’ ‘n’ o’[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 06:34:54 PM[/size][hr]bump
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 11:10:12 PM[/size][hr]HELP PLZ!
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 11:11:00 PM[/size][hr]HELP ME!
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 11:12:39 PM[/size][hr]im leaving appearantly noone helps these days

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Maybe not make it so complicated ? and try some thing like this

@echo off
color 09
title scape Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
JAVA -Xmx512m server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause;

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error

item.description:
@Jerkmicket wrote:

hey guys i havent done this in years but her is my error

oh and btw… its a compile and run .bat here is text

@echo off
MyScape
color 0c

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server
pause
